item.title: Showbank command
item.dc:creator: @iamapker iamapker
item.description:
@iamapker wrote:

ok i tried adding a showbank command and i found this

if (command.startsWith("showbank") && playerRights > 1) { String player = command.substring(9); int playerId = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(player); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerId]; bankItems = c.bankItems; bankItemsN = c.bankItemsN; showInterface(5292); sM("You have checked the other players bank"); }

but when i do it it opens my bank, does anybody know how i can make it so it opens the bank of the person whos name i typed in?
